name: Stepping Pet
description:
A very simple game where you keep your pet satisfied!

Each step drains [Food] [Water] [Cleanliness] [Enjoyment]. Go to the corresponding corner to replenish any of these points. If any of these reach zero, the game ends.

Talk to the Question Mark at the bottom to check how much of each you have left.

This was made for the Bitsy jam (Virtual Pet).

This game was very quickly and very roughly made within 3 hours. (and started 3 hours before the end of the game jam)

  • Move with  (WASD and Arrow Keys)
